title: Day Veteran

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose at night whether you want to go on alert the next day. (3 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When going on alert, you will gain Powerful defense for the night and the next day.
- While on alert, you will instantly deal a Powerful attack to anyone who targets you with a day ability and all people who vote you.
- Cannot spawn with any Veteran-type roles.
